result.name: 2007-2008-north-sea-nutrient-analysis
result.notes:
This data gives the concentration of nutrients in sea water samples from the 
water column and from sediments (pore-water) from three sites in the North Sea 
(North Dogger Bank, Oyster Ground, Sean Gasfield). Includes measurements for 
Total Oxidised Nitrogen (TOxN) Nitrite (NO2) Phophate (P04) Silicon (Si) and 
Ammonia (NH4)

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
